MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-OCT-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas, affecting properties in Corsock and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.30AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive damage to an electrical pole near Corsock Manse and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1.25PM on 31 October 2020.
